revised_title: Freshwater and Estuarine Studies: Managing Industrial Effects on Water Resources in England and Wales
tldr: This article discusses the challenges of managing water resources and pollution in England and Wales, considering the impact of industry, local authorities, and farmers on freshwater and estuarine ecosystems. It highlights the need for interdisciplinary studies, better administrative and financial systems, and coordinated research to address these complex issues effectively.
